title: shaco-ekko
body:
i was playing a game against a ekko i was shaco and it was late game, no matter when i tried to dodge ekkos ult i still got hit by it
anyone know what is the best time to ult to try and dodge his?

replies.body: I'n pretty sure if you press Alt+F4 at the right time, you will dodge it easily.
CS02 has a pretty straight forward answer. git gud ^
Why not just q away from his shadow ult thing? or just dont play shaco if u cant even do something as basic as time his ult to dodge a spell
Don't stand on his ghost lol...
